item.title: Avadi
item.description: Avadi The ‘Avadi’ school was founded in 2000. We have 150 students studying here, and they are supported by 20 teaching staff.

item.title: Vyasarpadi
item.description: Avadi The ‘Vysarpadi’ school was founded in 2005. We have 50 students studying here, and they are supported by 10 teaching staff.
